Reviews.Title: Canon camera package
Reviews.Author: ltanner
Reviews.Content: Great camera with lots of features.  It is simple enough for a beginner but with enough extra features for an experienced photographer to enjoy. Now I just have to relearn what I have forgotten over the years as I get back into photography.

Reviews.Title: Stick to Canon Digital SLR camera line - Excellent camera price/performance wise
Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: Buying 2nd Canon Digital SLR, decided for T3i, in a combo with 18-55mm and 55-250mm IS tele lens, plus Class 10 memory. Excellent camera price/performance wise

Reviews.Title: Prompt delivery and everything arrived on time and as described. Nice photos.
Reviews.Author: Sandra Langner
Reviews.Content: I've never tried a kit before and so far I've been very pleased with the picture quality from both lenses. All the little extras included were nice. Very compact and fit nicely in our M/C luggage carrier.  I've only taken 200 plus pictures, but they include a variety of settings: birds, mountains, sunsets, people etc. Very good resolution, not heavy and even on photos taken without a tripod are very acceptable. I've only head the camera a month so I don't have a lot of time invested in learning the special features. Photography is my hobby. I am not a professional, but appreciate good equip. I esp. Like the 18-55 lens, my main reason for this purchase.

Reviews.Title: hot deals is the place for me
Reviews.Author: Arthur Scarbro
Reviews.Content: hot deals has done a great job with this kit, I had a small issue but the people at hot deals cleared it up in one day and I could not be any happier about my purchased. thank you hot deals I will deal with you only for all of my photo needs.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 13 items, Camera & lens includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS APS-C Sensor DIGIC 4 Image Processor Full-HD Movie Mode Digital SLR Camera with 3.0-Inch Clear View Vari-Angle LCD (Body) - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens - Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4-5.6 IS II Image Stabilizer Telephoto Zoom Lens
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - 12 Slot Foldable Memory Card Case
Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - SLR Camera Multi-Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Neck Strap
2 UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filters - 5pc. Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS II Telephoto Zoom Lens + 10pc Bundle 16GB Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
